INTERSHOP IOM 4.5.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 8add396e0b85c43ce2cd63845a0dd80dd28a07d6)

Table oms.MailEventRegistryEntryDO

Handlers for customer e-mail events and additional properties.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
version integer  
creationDate timestamp without time zone NOT_NULL Creation date of the configuration. 
modificationDate timestamp without time zone Date the event object was last modified. 
active boolean NOT_NULL Whether the event handler is active or not. 
EventRegistryEntryDO eventRegistryEntryRef bigint NOT_NULL The event of a business process the customer e-mail should be processed for. 
MailEventDefDO mailEventDefRef integer The handler for e-mail events within business processes. E.g. "SEND_SHOP_CUSTOMER_MAIL_PC" can be referenced. 
DecisionBeanDefDO decisionBeanDefRef integer The implementation to check whether the e-mail should be send. E.g. "sendEmailDeciderBean" can be referenced. 
TransmissionTypeDefDO transmissionTypeDefRef integer The transmission type that sholud be used. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY MailEventRegistryEntryDO_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) 
FOREIGN KEY MailEventRegistryEntryDO_fk_eventRegistryEntryRef FOREIGN KEY ("eventRegistryEntryRef") REFERENCES "EventRegistryEntryDO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY fk_MailEventRegistryEntryDO_decisionBeanDefRef FOREIGN KEY ("decisionBeanDefRef") REFERENCES "DecisionBeanDefDO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY fk_MailEventRegistryEntryDO_mailEventDefRef FOREIGN KEY ("mailEventDefRef") REFERENCES "MailEventDefDO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY fk_MailEventRegistryEntryDO_transmissionTypeDefRef FOREIGN KEY ("transmissionTypeDefRef") REFERENCES "TransmissionTypeDefDO"(id)
